author: Reuters Editorial
title: Egypt to halt flights from Thursday to halt spread of coronavirus
description: Egypt will halt all air traffic from its airports starting Thursday until March 31 to prevent the spread of coronavirus, Prime Minister Mostafa Madbouly said on Monday.
content:
CAIRO (Reuters) - Egypt will halt all air traffic from its airports starting Thursday until March 31 to prevent the spread of coronavirus, Prime Minister Mostafa Madbouly said on Monday.
